display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(128, 128, 128); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Publishes merkle roots for each
batch of events to the blockchain.

div.div:
Two phase transactions when
multiple registries are involved.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 401px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Enables public verifiable claims of Granular Certificates.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 560px; margin-left: 401px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Conventional blockchain that will store a series of hashes for each merkle tree, ensuring that data within the tree cannot be changed without it being visible.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

font.font: Other registries that supports the same protocol, enabled cross registry claims.

switch.text: Executes signed requests to a registry.

font.font: Concept of accounts, users and holdings, manages public-private key pairs.

div.div:
Can read public data
to verify the authenticity
of claims.

claims aganst the registry

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

font.font: Will replace hard-coded rules to a ruleset defined by a shared ownership of the participating registries.

by shared group.

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
